data.title: Deepfake NCII targeting women politicians surges 400% globally
data.snippet: A new report documents an alarming increase in AI-generated non-consensual intimate imagery targeting female public figures and politicians.

data.title: South Korea passes landmark law criminalizing possession of deepfake intimate images
data.snippet: New legislation makes it illegal to possess, distribute, or create non-consensual deepfake intimate images, with penalties of up to 7 years imprisonment.

data.title: StopNCII.org hash-matching tool adopted by 10 additional platforms
data.snippet: The revenge porn prevention tool now operates across major social networks, blocking re-uploads of reported intimate images using hash technology.

data.title: India Supreme Court orders platforms to remove NCII within 24 hours of complaint
data.snippet: In a landmark ruling, the Supreme Court mandates immediate takedown of non-consensual intimate images and provides victims with expedited legal remedies.

data.title: University campus NCII crisis: 50+ students victimized by AI-generated images
data.snippet: A major US university investigates after dozens of students discover AI-generated intimate images of themselves circulating on social media.
